headline: Is Johnson & Johnson (JNJ) the Best Income Stock to Invest in Now?
summary: We recently published a list of the Best Income Stocks to Invest in Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) stands against other best income stocks. Amid concerns over trade restrictions and a weakening economy, some investors are seeking stability in dividend-paying stocks—a traditional defensive […]
